author: ahinzmann
body:
This add a producer to compute PUPPI weighted multipliticites from MiniAOD inputs. While classical multiplicities are integers and stored in the JetSpecific, for PUPPI jets one needs float values of multiplicities which take into account the probability for neutral particles to not originate from pileup.

This may not be worth a dataformat change yet, as is not part of any recommended object yet. @rappoccio
title: Puppi weighted multiplicities
